name: Thicc fall
description:
You are falling in dani's basement...

The goal of the game is to get as far as possible into Dani's basement .

Use the arrow keys to turn your body and klick on the screen in the beginning to use the controls.

if you consume milk, orange juice or a gucci banana, you will become more thicc. if you consume a pickle, a tomato or a bunch of bananas you become more thin.
you die when you get stuck for 10 seconds.

press the fusscreenbutto for fullscreen(you can than see everything)

i am a twelve year old  kid and I've only been working with unity for 2 months
Sorry for the few bugs...

Sorry for my English I am dutch.
